summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing grant agreements with the Washington Department of Ecology for the Longfellow Creek Watershed Management Plan, the Dayton Avenue Swale Project, and the Water Quality Education Project; authorizing the acceptance of the grant funds to be received; authorizing the hiring of consultants; adding one new position; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1989 Budget of the Seattle Engineering Department; and making reimbursable appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating and Drainage and Wastewater Funds therefor.
